website_summaries.verdict: This addition to New Balance’s Numeric skate line is a multi-faceted sneaker that not only limits to skating use. Beyond skateboarding, this classic low-top silhouette possesses the makeup of a timeless design that surpasses the boardwalk routines and straight to the street style shenanigans. Moreover, the fact that the NB AM331 comes with an inexpensive price tag allows anybody to feel the comfort and style that comes with this sneaker.
pros: Avid sneaker wearers agree that the New Balance All Coasts 331 delivers when it comes to comfort and style
The majority of the users express how the shoe features a clean and slick-looking design
Numerous buyers describe how the materials on this kick are made from good quality
Many users comment that the insole feels very cushiony, thanks to the Fresh Foam inside
The canvas upper makes it easier to clean, quips some consumers
Several skaters share that the New Balance 331 feels more comfortable and holds up better than most Vans’ shoes
A few wearers share they get compliments when wearing this trainer
The colorways are very wearable with different outfit choices, notes some individuals
New Balance sneakers loyalists state that they will buy another pair or two of this low-cut shoe
cons: Many shoe buyers mention that the NB All Coasts 331 lacks arch support
The tongue, per some reviewers, is too long and tends to chafe the skin on the foot
According to a few skate enthusiasts, the insole needs more padding

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers and price
customer_reviews.text: I had these for walking, its seems NB make sneakers better for people that do a lot of walking. I came across them when i was just browsing thru sneakers and came to these with a low price, i bought them and stored them as replacement. I prefer the camou version of these shoes but these white color ones will do. Bought them for $27.37, while these can go for as high as $50 plus, so money save.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Eye Tiger Cub

customer_reviews.title: Got em super cheap, nice basic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Got the greenish grey ones on sale for $25. For that price, I'm very happy. They have that spandex inner lining kinda like a sock between the sole and tongue of the shoe but I don't mind it.
customer_reviews.author: MECH-E

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, DaD Cool and Approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: Design, and style on a buget, nice to slip on and off with out socks, great for the beach, and a shoe you can just slip on and off, and still look DaD cool in the process, ,LoL
customer_reviews.author: Bill Larry  Mike

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes but they run small.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes but they run small. I don’t normally wear a size 12 shoe but it seems like NB shoes run small. Originally had an 11 but that was very snug. Walked all day at an amusement park and my feet felt fine afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wall

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these New Balance skate shoes! It did take a week or so to break the shoes in because my son has a very high instep and these shoes don't allow alot of instep room
customer_reviews.author: kpm292

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: They look good and are comfortable. On the other side, they're made from a canvas material that will last for 4 months. Odor collects very fast, and If wrinkles and stains bother you, then dont buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Color fades in short time.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this shoes; however, the only complaint that I have is that the color is starting to fade after 4 months of normal use. Besides that, it is a pretty comfty and good looking product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great skate shoes . My son loves them and the green looks really good in person.
customer_reviews.author: Tara SD

customer_reviews.title: Nice everyday tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sneakers! My husband loves these shoes. He can wear them business casual to work on Fridays. Fit well and are comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, fits great and saving for another pair. I do suggest some nicer soles though, went through the stock ones pretty quickly
customer_reviews.author: MadDonkey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: We love New balance in our home and it's great to turn on the you her generation to a great shoe and product :)
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Joy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and look awesome. I have a slightly wider foot and some shoes in this style can be a little uncomfortable, but no problems with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son loves these! My daughter almost swiped them, because they're so nice looking a girl could wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Good looks but get dirty easy, not very comfortable for long day
customer_reviews.text: not much support, a style shoe no doubt. In that role only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Moose the Moose

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, it's a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. It's inexpensive, it's a great shoe. Made in Indonesia.
customer_reviews.author: Trang

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got size 5.5 fit as expected. Been (ab)using them 6 months now, they are in good condition for shoes this price. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than most name brand skate shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend who has skateboarded for 16 years. These are his new favorite shoes. He liked them more than the etnies and supras we got. Definitely will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Stacey

customer_reviews.title: It’s canvas
customer_reviews.text: It’s not suede it’s canvas and do not buy them for skating, also the top is kinda rounded off so it barely has flick. Feels okay tho.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Caritoux

customer_reviews.title: Love new balance
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. I own about 18 pairs of these shoes in different colors
customer_reviews.author: christopher placek

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend was happy !
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was excited ! He loved them and I’m so happy with the product :)
customer_reviews.author: Carlee Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the low cut look of the sneakers. I use them as my after work shoes for bike riding and walk-ing
customer_reviews.author: Cory 8

customer_reviews.title: Colors aren’t an exact match
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes the color that was shown on amamzon is a little different then true color that I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Laporte

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's All Coasts 331 Low Top Sneaker Shoes Burgundy/Gray
product_meta.description:
This New Balance Men's All Coasts 331 Low Top Sneaker Shoes Burgundy/Gray 10 by New Balance features Closed cell polyurethane (PU) insert protection provides super impact protection and consistent fit. Genuine Gum rubber or N-durance rubber outsole for superior grip and durability. Multi-layered toe cap for durability. Suede canvas upper Style Number: AM331-BTG New Genuine, 100% Authentic Official Licensed Product. SKU: NBE-AM331-BTG. UPC 193684259694 



DISCLAIMER: Cluburban does not accept any responsibility and will not be held liable for any damage to your property while using this product. Individual results may vary, use at your own risk.

Closed cell polyurethane (PU) insert protection provides super impact protection and consistent fit. Genuine Gum rubber or N-durance rubber outsole for superior grip and durability. Multi-layered toe cap for durability. Suede canvas upper
